my_favourite_bni_story: My Favourite BNI Story: “The Power of One Connection” A member once joined BNI from a small printing business — just like many of us, he walked in hoping to get a few clients. During one of the meetings, another member casually referred him to a branding consultant. That one referral opened a new world — the branding consultant introduced him to a corporate client, which led to a partnership worth lakhs of rupees every year. Within months, his small print shop grew into a full-fledged printing house with upgraded equipment, new staff, and steady business. When asked how it all began, he said — > “It wasn’t luck. It was BNI — because in BNI, one connection can change everything.”

name: Mugundan Subramani
company_address: 89-A, Nava India Road, Avarampalayam,, Ganapathy Po.,, Coimbatore,, Tamil Nadu, 641006
my_business: At Elixir Electronics, for the past 20+ years, we serve as a complete system integrator — not just selling products, but designing, implementing, and managing customized security and automation solutions tailored to each client’s specific needs.
top_product: Our most in-demand product is the Biometric Attendance System – perfect for schools, offices, and industries. It ensures accurate time tracking, prevents buddy punching, and gives real-time reports to management. Combined with face recognition, mobile app access, and cloud backup, it’s a complete HR + security solution. If your contact struggles with manual attendance or staff tracking, just say – “You must talk to Mugundan from Elixir Electronics!”
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a Trusted Leading Builder, Architect, or Business owner planning a new project — commercial, residential, or retail. Anyone who needs CCTV surveillance, biometric attendance systems, home security, or automation solutions, In Simple Security Solutions — from Individual houses, Offices, Apartment Complex, Commerical Compex to multi-storey buildings — is perfect. If you hear someone say: “We’re setting up a new office/home and want everything secured and automated” — think Mugundan from Elixir Electronics!
top_problem_solved: A leading textile showroom had frequent proxy attendance and unauthorized overtime claims and struggling to match their Daily Bata Calculation. We replaced their outdated system with a face recognition biometric system linked to real-time reporting and payroll integration with ease of use. Result? ✔️ *100% accurate attendance* ✔️ *Zero buddy punching* ✔️ *Streamlined Bata Calulcation & Salary processing* Their HR team called it a "game changer” — and we now handle their other branches across all over Tamilnadu too!
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my best BNI moments was when a fellow member referred me to a school that was struggling with manual attendance and CCTV issues. I provided a complete biometric solution with centralized software and HD CCTV coverage. Not only did the school save time and improve security, but the principal was so impressed that he referred me to 3 More educational Institutions in his network! That’s the power of BNI — one referral created a chain of opportunities!

I improved not just as a business owner but as a person. BNI is not just about business – it's about building meaningful relationships and growing together.
